metadata.title: CVE-2023-6679 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found indpll_pin_parent_pin_set() in drivers/dpll/dpll_netlink.c in the DigitalPhase Locked Loop (DPLL) subsystem in the Linux kernel. This issue could beexploited to trigger a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
